alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dickinson County through 445 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Florence to near Norway. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, penny size hail and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norway Iron Mountain Quinnesec. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
